titles.title: SHAME Act
SHAME Act
Stop Helping Adversaries Manipulate Everything Act
To prohibit persons from accepting compensation for serving as an agent of, or lobbyist for, a foreign adversary, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

bill.summary:
Stop Helping Adversaries Manipulate Everything Act or the SHAME Act
This bill prohibits registered agents or lobbyists of foreign adversaries from receiving compensation for their services. Violations are subject to civil penalties.
